alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 28 at 5:38PM EDT until March 28 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Taylor County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 538 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles south of Perry, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Steinhatchee, Tennille, Fish Creek, Jug Island, Howell Place, Clara, Carbur, Adams Beach, Dekle Beach, Jack Lee Island, Keaton Beach, Bird Island, Salem, Blue Springs and Cedar Island. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
